title: Random Mouse Lags
body:
For the past two days, I experienced random mouse lags whenever I clicked on the ground, a minion or a champ. I have to click so many times and there are instances that my char randomly moves forward (didnt misclick). My ping is stable at 34ms and fps at 110-150. 

At first I thought it's a lag but everything moves perfectly fine except me. I read a couple of same issues happened 2013-2014 but they just waited for riot to issue a patch fix. Any other players w/ same problem out there?

replies.body:
This could be caused by a difference between your mouse cursor speed settings on your computer and in your client. These settings are different from each other, and might be causing your mouse to move slower during the game. 

If that's not the case, let's try resetting your config files. Follow the steps in our  [**Mouse and Keyboard Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761934#wq2) on how to reset your configuration files.

Let me know how these worked for you!

does this still work?

Let's try not to revive dead posts please, as it'll keep notifying the original poster, but these should still work. You can also just use these steps as well ^_^!

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

i was able to fix this problem as i realized my frames were inconsistent but extremely high so id drop from 256 to 156 frames and the causes the teleport effect just cap your frames at 144 or lower should sort it out

My mouse doesn't seem to freeze but my mouse jitters. Like moving the mouse at all it has trouble smoothly moving. It like jitters back and forth. Only occurs in league. I have a Logitech mouse with the polling up to max and set to gaming mode in the software.

I'm having a similar issue that just started this latest patch.  My mouse will suddenly freeze in fights.. I cant move, and if i clicked a direction before the freeze.. I will continue walking that direction.  I've tried other mouses with the same issue.  I have done the mouse configurations, and i have even re-installed the game.
